name: Dark Mystery
developer: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
description: Dark Mystery is a Puzzled Platformer Game in which player faces different types of difficulties to find his true love.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later required Processor: Intel Core i3 515 7U Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB AMD or NVIDIA Graphic Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or Later Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Nvidia GTX 970 Graphic Card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2000 MB available space
